name: Company Absences
desc: Company Absences Management application for making, approving, auditing, and checking up on vacation/sick/business trip requests

name: Network Maintenance
desc: Application for managing, organizing, and auditing Network Maintenance requests from suppliers and forwarding on notifications to the appropriate customers

name: Youtube Playlists
desc: Side-project for creating dynamic YouTube Playlists. PWA which makes use of the Web Share Target API as well as Google's Cast API (Coming Soon)

name: NOC Dashboard
desc: Network Operations Center Dashboard which is displayed 24/7 on a large display in our office. Includes stats from Netdata as well as Observium and live video feeds transcoded via ffmpeg live for displaying in the browser

name: PreactTyper
desc: Pika / Preact example project. Typer effect in Terminal
